content: {A想象中}Back in the day, nothing beat cramming my pack and gearing up to hit the road with my master at dawn. Off into the unknown!
info: 捉赶海生物-莎莎闲聊_主流程文本II

content: Not to brag, but I invented the ten-in-one super wrench I use for vehicle maintenance all by myself!<style=SizeSmall>Though I can't remember how I made it anymore.</style>
info: 捉赶海生物-莎莎闲聊_主流程文本II

content: Once you get your own car, I'll take you out on some fun adventures, swoosh~. Oh, by the way, <style=NpcName>Mobai</style> seems to be waiting for you. Don't forget to go see him.
info: 捉赶海生物-莎莎闲聊_主流程文本II

content: {A抛扳手}Tools for the repair... Huh? I was just thinking about how to fix the vehicle.
info: 捉赶海生物-莎莎闲聊_主流程文本II

content: {A开心}Waking up to the sea, the beach, swoosh~! Time to hit the shore and do a hundred patrol laps!
info: 捉赶海生物-莎莎闲聊_主流程文本II

content: Then throw down with those crabby little claw-clackers! And we'll find out who's faster once and for all, heh! My shellfish tongs... where are my shellfish tongs...
